snippet: Shin Kyung-sook, one of South Korea’s most acclaimed and successful writers, focuses on social upheaval and the price of her country’s success in novels like “Please Look After Mom.”
abstract: Saturday Profile of Shin Kyung-sook, one of South Korea's most accomplished writers; Shin's life, which tracked the trajectory of her country's rise, prepared her well for her role as an interpreter of her generation.
lead_paragraph: Shin Kyung-sook, one of South Korea’s most acclaimed and successful writers, focuses on social upheaval and the price of her country’s success in novels like “Please Look After Mom.”

headline.seo: Shin Kyung-sook Mines South Korea’s Sense of Loss
headline.main: A Writer Evokes Loss on South Korea’s Path to Success
headline.print_headline: A Writer Evokes Loss on South Korea’s Path to Success
